Ocula 是 The Foundry 官方開發給 Nuke（未來應該會提供給其它 compositing software）用，專門用來處理與 stereo 有關的 plugin，在這邊放上來，供每個人之後參考用。

PS. All snapshots of Nuke and related plugins are copyrighted to The Foundry and related pluging developers. They are here just for academic usage only.

Ocula 2.0 Nodes

  • O_Solver
  • O_DisparityGenerator
  • O_NewView
  • O_InteraxialShifter
  • O_DepthToDisparity
  • O_DisparityToDepth
